targets.expr:
topk(5,(
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Running"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Running"}[5m])))

topk(5,(
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Waiting"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Waiting"}[5m])))
